relics.name: Alchemist Glove
relics.description: Every 3 turns, apply 4 Burning to ALL enemies.
relics.flavorText: It allows you to control fire with the snap of a finger.

relics.name: Battle Drones
relics.description: Whenever a card Synergizes, deal 3 damage to a random enemy and gain 1 Block.
relics.flavorText: Engineering perfection.

relics.name: Heavy Halberd
relics.description: Your Attacks deal 15% more damage.
relics.flavorText: Ruling over death means ruling over life. Death is the climax of life. To have the best death, you must honor life.

relics.name: Old Coffin
relics.description: Starting from your 4th turn, apply a random Debuff to a random enemy at the start of each turn.
relics.flavorText: Shocking Truth!

relics.name: Engraved Staff
relics.description: At the end of your turn, Retain your highest cost card, it costs 1 less next turn.
relics.flavorText: One of the most treasured possessions of the Guild.

relics.name: Hallowed Scabbard
relics.description: If you lose a total of 15 HP or more in a combat, gain 5 Regeneration and 2 Strength. Activates once per combat.
relics.flavorText: The holder of the scabbard is granted potent healing, allowing for critical and fatal wound to be rapidly repaired.

relics.name: Hoodie
relics.description: If you end a combat without taking damage, gain 3 Max HP.
relics.flavorText: With this, you might be admitted to the Hero association.

relics.name: Wizard Hat
relics.description: At the end of each turn, consume 1 of your unspent Energy. Every time this consumes a total of 4 Energy, deal 48 damage to ALL enemies.
relics.flavorText: Explosion magic is the strongest magic. But that also means it takes time to prepare.

relics.description: YmVoYXZlcw== ZXJyYXRpY2FsbHk=, 57GFD0c= NzQ=

relics.name: Ancient Medallion
relics.description:
At the start of each combat, Heal 4 HP.
Upon pickup, Upgrade 2 random cards and a card of your choice. If the chosen card can be upgraded multiple times, it will be upgraded twice.

relics.name: Cursed Glyph
relics.description:
Upon pickup, lose 4 Max HP, all enemies start with additional Max HP.

The card linked to this relic can NOT be duplicated.
relics.flavorText: Maybe it was a mistake...

relics.name: Exquisite Blood Vial
relics.description:
At the start of each combat, heal 2 HP.

[Special Relic]
Right Click at a rest site to start a special fight, winning it will activate this relic's true effect.

You can click this after using a rest site option, Act 3 deck level suggested.
relics.flavorText: A vial containing the blood of a pure and elder vampire.

relics.name: The Egnaro Piece
relics.description:
Gain [E] and draw 1 card at the start of each turn.
Gain 1 Temporary HP at the end of each turn, then increase this number by 1.
relics.flavorText: What is this thing?

relics.name: The Eruza Stone
relics.description:
Gain [E] [E] at the start of each turn.
Whenever you play a Power, draw 1 card.
relics.flavorText: What is this thing?

relics.name: The Wolley Core
relics.description:
Draw 2 cards at the start of each turn.
Whenever you play a card, deal 2 damage to ALL enemies and gain 1 Block.
relics.flavorText: What is this thing?

relics.name: Cursed Blade
relics.description:
Whenever you deal unblocked damage, Heal 2 HP.
Permanently Lose Half of your Max HP. Effects that increase your Max HP are reduced by half.
relics.flavorText: It draws strength from the blood of its user, truly fitting for a vampire.

relics.name: Race Piece
relics.description: Upon pickup, select 1 card, then choose and Transform 3 cards in your deck into 3 cards of the selected card's Series.
relics.flavorText: Did you see that coming Mr. Mind Reader? Checkmate.

relics.name: Vivid Picture
relics.description:
Replaces The Living Picture.
Once per turn, when a card Synergizes, draw 1 card and gain [E]
relics.flavorText: It's always watching.

relics.name: Cereal Box
relics.description:
Right Click to Heal 2 HP.
Starts at 12 uses, gain 4 uses when entering a shop room.
You can store up to 20 uses.
relics.flavorText: Whole Grain Guaranteed! Approved by Konayuki.

relics.name: Colorless Fragment
relics.description: Replaces The Missing Piece. Every 3 combats, receive improved card rewards. Chance to contain colorless cards.
relics.flavorText: The colors are slowly fading away...

keywords.name: Air
keywords.description: Orb: Deal Piercing damage to ALL enemies.

keywords.name: Animator:unique
keywords.description: Unique|Can be upgraded any number of times. You can only have 1 copy of this card in your deck, additional copies will Upgrade this card instead.

keywords.name: Augmentable
keywords.description: Can be upgraded any number of times.

keywords.name: Boost
keywords.description:
If this counter is greater
than 0, activate the effect then reduce this counter by 1. Resets at the end of each fight.

keywords.name: Burning
keywords.description: Take damage at the start of your turn. Also take 4% more Attack damage per stack. Reduced by 1 each turn.

keywords.name: Choked
keywords.description: Whenever you play a card this turn, the target loses 1 HP.

keywords.name: Constricted
keywords.description: Take damage at the end of each turn.

keywords.name: Cooldown
keywords.description: Reduced by 1 when this card is played or discarded, if it was at 0, activate the effect and reset.

keywords.name: Demon form
keywords.description: Gain Strength at the start of each turn.

keywords.name: Discover
keywords.description: Choose 1 of 3 random cards to add to your hand. It costs 0 this turn.

keywords.name: Earth
keywords.description: Orb: Gain temporary Thorns while Channeled. It is automatically Evoked after 3 turns and deals damage randomly split amongst ALL enemies.

keywords.name: Enchanted armor
keywords.description: Take less damage from ALL Sources. Further stacks are less effective.

keywords.name: Envenom
keywords.description: Whenever an attack deals unblocked damage, apply 1 Poison per stack.

keywords.name: Fire
keywords.description: Orb: Apply Burning and damage the highest health enemy.

keywords.name: Flame barrier
keywords.description: Until your next turn, whenever you are attacked, deal 1 damage back to the enemy.

keywords.name: Flaming weapon
keywords.description: Whenever an attack deals unblocked damage, apply 1 Burning.

keywords.name: Flight
keywords.description: Take 50% less Attack damage. Lose 1 stack until end of turn when taking damage, the power is cancelled at 0 stacks.

keywords.name: Heartseeker
keywords.description: If the target has less than 50% HP, deal double damage.

keywords.name: Juggernaut
keywords.description: Whenever you gain Block, deal damage to a random enemy.

keywords.name: Lazy
keywords.description: This card's damage will be delayed by a random number of turns.

keywords.name: Legacy
keywords.description: Triggers when this card is exhausted.

keywords.name: Limited
keywords.description: Can only be played once per turn. Affects ALL copies of this card.

keywords.name: Loyal
keywords.description: Whenever this card would enter your discard pile, shuffle it into your draw pile.

keywords.name: Malleable
keywords.description: Upon receiving attack damage, gain Block. Block gain increases as this power is triggered. Resets at the start of your turn.

keywords.name: Mark
keywords.description: The owner is inflicted with the specified Debuff or Effect when receiving damage. Lasts 1 turn.

keywords.name: Martial artist
keywords.description: This card's damage also scales with Dexterity.

keywords.name: Motivate
keywords.description: Reduce the cost of a random card in hand by 1 until played. Repeated N times.

keywords.name: Orb core
keywords.description: Power: Channel 1 orb on use, gain a bonus effect on your second Synergy each turn.

keywords.name: Overrun
keywords.description: Activates for each enemy that loses its block during this attack.

keywords.name: Persistent
keywords.description: Whenever this card would enter your discard pile, shuffle it into your draw pile.

keywords.name: Piercing
keywords.description: Ignore the target's Block and Thorns.

keywords.name: Rebound
keywords.description: Put the next card you play this turn on top of your draw pile.

keywords.name: Recall
keywords.description: Trigger when this card is manually discarded or cycled.

keywords.name: Reload
keywords.description: Discard any number of cards, activate this effect that many times.

keywords.name: Resurrect
keywords.description: If you would die, and this card is anywhere in your deck, prevent all Damage and permanently lose this card. Will not work if Exhausted or Purged.

keywords.name: Shapeshifter
keywords.description: Synergizes with any card.

keywords.name: Spellcaster
keywords.description: This card's damage also scales with Focus.

keywords.name: Support damage
keywords.description: Deal damage to the enemy with lowest HP at the end of each turn.

keywords.name: Synergy
keywords.description: Activates if the last card played this turn was from the same series.

keywords.name: Temp. hp
keywords.description: Temporary HP disappears at the end of combat.

keywords.name: Throwing-knife
keywords.description: 0-Cost Attack which applies a randomized debuff and Exhausts.
